Safe to publish.

content.value_statement: This minimal skill template provides a foundation for creating custom API integration prompts. It enables developers to extend Claude with specialized API interaction patterns for their specific use cases.
actual_capabilities: Provides a minimal YAML frontmatter structure for skill metadata
Serves as a starting template for custom API skill development
Includes basic skill configuration fields like name and description
Compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code platforms
limitations: Contains minimal implementation with only a placeholder prompt
Requires customization and expansion for production use
No built-in API request handling or error management
Does not include example prompts or detailed documentation

output_examples.input: What is in this API skill?
output_examples.output: This is a minimal API skill template with basic metadata (name: api-skill, description: Updated API skill) and a placeholder prompt. It serves as a starting point for custom API skill development.

output_examples.input: How do I customize this template for my API?
output_examples.output: Edit the SKILL.md file to add your API-specific prompts and instructions. Update the description field to reflect your API's purpose. Add detailed prompts that guide Claude on how to interact with your specific endpoints, authentication, and data formats.

best_practices: Customize the description and name fields to clearly identify your specific API integration
Add comprehensive prompt examples that demonstrate the full range of API operations
Include authentication and error handling guidance in your skill prompts
anti_patterns: Using the template without customization in production environments
Hardcoding API credentials or tokens directly in skill files
Creating overly generic skills that do not provide specific API guidance

faq.question: What is this skill template for?
faq.answer: This is a minimal starting template for developers who want to create custom API skills for Claude. It provides the basic structure needed to build more complex integrations.

faq.question: Can I use this template as-is?
faq.answer: No. This template requires customization with your specific API details, prompts, and integration logic before it provides meaningful functionality.

faq.question: Which AI tools work with this template?
faq.answer: This template is compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. The skill format follows standard conventions that work across these platforms.

faq.question: How do I add my API details?
faq.answer: Edit the SKILL.md file to include your API endpoints, authentication methods, request formats, and example interactions in the prompt content area.

faq.question: Does this template make actual API calls?
faq.answer: No. This is only a template structure. You must add implementation details and the AI tool must have appropriate permissions to execute API requests.

faq.question: What should I change first?
faq.answer: Start by updating the name and description fields in the YAML frontmatter, then replace the placeholder prompt with specific instructions for your API use case.
